item.description:
This is a last minute idea for this weekend. I live in Acton and invite everybody to join Winter carnival at Nara Park (Sat. Feb.6 from 4 pm until 7:30 pm).
More information here http://www.acton-ma.g...
Nara Park has two entrances, please park at the main entrance. I'll be at the playground in Nara park from 4:00 till 4:20, if you'll come later please look for Russian speaking kids in the crowd.
Nara Park location: 25 Ledge Rock Way, Acton, MA 01720 (use yahoo maps, google has problem with finding this location).

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Winter carnival at Nara Park
